name: undesired

not wanted: Such huge attention also caused some undesired consequences. How does a person lose undesired body fat?
More examplesFewer examplesThe goal is to increase desired behaviours and decrease undesired behaviours by using prompts, cues, and positive reinforcement. She had preferred to busy herself in the kitchen to avoid undesired attention.High doses of radiation may result in several undesired reactions.The quality of their goods is not the best, and so it is often returned or undesired.
